General.Name: Shenzhen JPT Opto Electronics Co Ltd
General.Description: Shenzhen JPT Opto-Electronics Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, sale, and technical services of laser, intelligent equipment, and optical devices. It offers LC - LC uniboot, FC & ST series, FTTH, LC, LC-SC, and multi cores patch cord; waterproof series, cables assembly, connectors, adaptors, attenuators, PLC splitter, and splitter box; high power fiber optical components; data center solutions, including MPO and MTP patch cord, and active optical cable; and boxes and accessories. It also offers passive components such as laser scriber, high voltage resistor tester, single chip resistor tester, laser trimmer, hybrid trimmer; optical inspection; laser equipment, such as PCB laser making system, 2D barcode marking and reading, high precision 2DBC laser marking; module inspection; and vision inspection. In addition, it offers mopa fiber laser, CW fiber laser, DPSS laser, and laser diodes. Its products are used in marking, cutting, welding, cleaning, deep engraving, drilling, additive manufacturing/3D printing, etc. The company was incorporated in 2006 and is based in Shenzhen, China.
